attributes.action: Save the Royal Naval Community Resource Centre bars
attributes.additional_details: A decision has been taken to close the bar areas of the Royal Navy Royal Marines Community Resource Centres (CRC's) throughout the Portsmouth area. These CRC's are a social hub for a variety of serving personnel, veterans, associates and of course the families. Each CRC is a haven for members and their families to show support for each other, we provide a friendly environment for fun, practical and emotional support to anyone who is serving or has ever served and their families. When needed, we have always been there. Help us to continue to be there.
